entities.name: hall
entities.description: The hall is mentioned as the location where Hagrid is standing and waiting for a crowd of Ravenclaws to pass. ("Hagrid was standing beside the doors into the entrance hall...")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is heavily bruised and has a new cut on his nose. He is waiting for a crowd of Ravenclaws to pass. ("Hagrid was standing beside the doors into the entrance hall...", "Are you okay, Hagrid? asked Harry...")

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaws is a group of students who are passing through the hall. ("waiting for a crowd of Ravenclaws to pass")

entities.name: giants
entities.description: Giants is a species that Hagrid had a mission to deal with. ("he had come back from his mission to the giants...")
